resources.string: Now you can create the list of your daily activities!!!

This is Sample application i.e,ToDo List here using the concept of UI layout design and the java programming language to build the logic of the project user of this application may experience the data inconsistency receiving to some sequential executing of the instructions and also its built using the basic concept related to app development.
User can set multiple Activity and can edit the Same with edit Button
User can also delete the activity after its completion
User can also set the time and date with the adding of activity. The application built with help of Android documentation.
App was built by Nishanth for more queries.....
others can free to develop this to the next level
